abstract: Political and emotional atmosphere in Israel is highly charged as the first wave of joy that greeted the news of Israeli soldier Gilad Shalit's release as part of a prisoner exchange; many Israelis express concern that some of the Palestinian prisoners to be released in the deal will attack and kill Israelis again.
snippet: News of a prisoner exchange between Israel and Hamas has been painful for families whose loved ones were murdered by some of the 1,000 Palestinians to be released.
lead_paragraph: News of a prisoner exchange between Israel and Hamas has been painful for families whose loved ones were murdered by some of the 1,000 Palestinians to be released.

headline.main: In Israel, Swap Touches Old Wounds
headline.print_headline: In Israel, Swap Touches Old Wounds
headline.seo: Israel Prisoner Swap Touches Old Wounds
